users.bio: Quarter-zip enthusiast. Always cozy, always stylish.
Layering queen. Quarter-zips for every season.
Athleisure addict. Quarter-zips for workouts and lounging.

brands.name: Lululemon
brands.description: Stylish and comfortable quarter-zips for everyday wear.

brands.name: Ralph Lauren
brands.description: Luxury quarter-zips for a polished look.

occasions.name: Casual
occasions.description: Everyday wear for lounging or running errands.

occasions.name: Athletic
occasions.description: Workouts, gym sessions, or outdoor activities.

occasions.name: Travel
occasions.description: Comfortable and stylish for flights or road trips.

outfits.name: Nike Sport Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: Breathable and lightweight quarter-zip for workouts. Perfect for layering over a tank top.

outfits.name: Patagonia Fleece Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: Warm and eco-friendly quarter-zip for travel or outdoor adventures. Pairs well with jeans.

outfits.name: Lululemon Scuba Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: Soft and cozy quarter-zip for lounging or casual outings. Available in multiple colors.

outfits.name: Ralph Lauren Polo Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: Luxury quarter-zip for a polished office look. Pairs well with chinos or dress pants.

outfits.name: Under Armour HeatGear Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: High-performance quarter-zip for intense workouts. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool.

outfits.name: Nike Essential Quarter-Zip
outfits.description: Versatile quarter-zip for casual wear. Lightweight and breathable.
